title: Soul Food Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Ayurvedic
description: Vegetarian cafe that's part of the Taan Maan Yoga Center, opened in Dec 2013. Serves vegan food with the exception of egg and dairy as add-on. The a la carte menu and daily changing menu features salads, juices, smoothies, imported and local coffee, herbal teas. Also sells products like organic quinoa and prepared foods for take away like sandwiches and cookies. Free Wi-Fi. Located next to Nyati Group Office, Lane 6 (near Jogger's Park) in a garden setting.
